news.title: Oracle shares on pace for worst quarter since 2001 as new CEOs face concerns about AI build-out
news.summary: Investors want to know if Oracle, under new CEOs Clay Magouyrk and Mike Sicilia, can pay for and deliver data centers packed with Nvidia chips.

news.title: Google is rolling out a new feature allowing users to change their Gmail address
news.summary: Google is rolling out a feature that lets users change their Gmail addresses. It's been a long-requested update to their email policy.

news.title: The Trump-class battleship faces a large obstacle in its way: Reality
news.summary: The cost of building the battleship would be prohibitive. Even if it were technically feasible, it would be expensive and time-consuming.

news.title: Why buying Berkshire was Warren Buffett's biggest mistake
news.summary: Buffett explains why buying the company was his biggest mistake in 2010 CNBC video clip. Buffett is in his last week as Berkshire Hathaway's CEO.

news.title: Free streaming service Tubi is rivaling major players for viewership. Here's how it's winning
news.summary: Fox's Tubi outpaced Peacock and HBO Max for share of streaming minutes in Nielsen's November Gauge report. Tubi is available on the Fox streaming app.

news.title: What’s ahead for Tesla as it doubles down on AI
news.summary: Tesla’s stock was closing 2025 on a high note, as investors see progress on CEO Elon Musk's promise to grow the robotaxi business.

news.title: Silver is turning into one of the hottest trades of 2025. Why this veteran investor is targeting $300 in a coming ‘mania’ phase.
news.summary: Peter Krauth, author of “The Great Silver Bull,” says silver’s “mania phase” is not far off.

news.title: My in-laws say they’re ‘stakeholders’ in my daughter’s bat mitzvah and want us to throw a bigger party. Do I say no?
news.summary: “If we do let them pay for  something small, my wife is worried that my in-laws will see it as a sign that they have permission to take over,” he says.

news.title: Here’s everything the ‘geniuses’ on Wall Street got wrong about the markets in 2025
news.summary: Investing experts were wrong in so many ways this year, says CNN's John Sutter. Sutter: "I think we're going to see a lot of good news in the next few months"

news.title: Wall Street’s gift to investors often arrives a day after Christmas
news.summary: Dec. 26 has historically been the most reliably positive day of the year. For the S&P 500, Dec. 26 is a good day.
